sentences.en: "I think I'll try a hypnotist," I said with sudden resolution.
sentences.cn: “我会找催眠师试试，”我突然坚决地说。

sentences.en: A majority vote enabled the passage of the resolution.
sentences.cn: 多数人投赞成票使议案得以通过.

sentences.en: a resolution calling for a ban on dumping nuclear waste
sentences.cn: 要求禁止倾倒核废物的决议

sentences.en: Carol made a resolution to work harder at school.
sentences.cn: 卡萝尔下决心要更用功地学习。

sentences.en: He is one of the senators who signed last week's resolution.
sentences.cn: 他是签署上周决议的参议员之一.

sentences.en: Parliament adopted a resolution calling for the complete withdrawal of troops.
sentences.cn: 议会采纳了要求全部撤军的决议。

sentences.en: She made a New Year's resolution to get fit.
sentences.cn: 她的新年决心是要保持身材健美。

sentences.en: She made a resolution to visit her relatives more often.
sentences.cn: 她决定要多走走亲戚。

sentences.en: The committee have passed a resolution that conditions ( should ) be improved.
sentences.cn: 委员会通过了改善环境的决议.

sentences.en: The conductor brought home the full thrust of the work's emotional resolution.
sentences.cn: 指挥将该作品情感上的毅然决然这一主旨充分表现了出来。

sentences.en: The draft resolution was adopted by a majority of 128.
sentences.cn: 这项提案以超过128票的多数获得通过.

sentences.en: The Estonian parliament has passed a resolution declaring the republic fully independent.
sentences.cn: 爱沙尼亚议会已经通过了宣布共和国完全独立的决议。

sentences.en: The resolution had been received with great disappointment within the PLO.
sentences.cn: 巴解组织内部对决议表现出极大失望。

sentences.en: The resolution stopped short of an outright declaration of independence.
sentences.cn: 这项决议几乎成为公开的独立宣言。

sentences.en: Then, with sudden resolution, she stood up.
sentences.cn: 然后，她突然很坚决地站了起来。

sentences.en: There's some question as to whether he will sign this resolution.
sentences.cn: 他是否会签署这项决议还不能确定。

sentences.en: They have failed to comply with the resolution.
sentences.cn: 他们没有遵守决议。

sentences.en: They made an objection to the imperial system with resolution.
sentences.cn: 他们坚决反对帝制.

sentences.en: We would rather withdraw the draft resolution than amend it.
sentences.cn: 与其修改决议草案,不如予以撤回.

sentences.en: Yesterday's resolution says the present Polish border is "inviolable".
sentences.cn: 昨天的决议称现在的波兰边界是“不可侵犯的”。

words.tran_cn: 可分解的；可解决的；可溶解的
下定决心的；已解决的；断然的
解决；决定；分解；转变（resolve的过去分词）
分辨（resolve的ing形式）；分解；决定；解决矛盾
决定；溶解；使…分解；决心要做…

phrases.tran_cn: 方位分解度，方位分辨率；方位角分辨
图像分辨率；影像解析度；影像分辨力；图像清晰度
距离分辨率；测距角像力
分辨本领；分辨能力；分解能力
时间分辨率；瞬时分辨力；瞬时清晰度
时间分辨率；时间分辨能力；时间分辨本领

trans.tran_en: when someone solves a problem, argument, or difficult situation
